Column.Name: Parent Structure

Label.Text: Filter to determine when state change should happen e.g., [Status] = 'Overdue'
The date that will be used to determine when a status change should happen (Context date)
Change status before, after or on context date
How long before / after the context date should the status change

Binding.Expression: IF( [When] = "Before", "How long after the context date should the status change", "How long before the context date should the status change" )

Label.Text: New status to apply to matching records
Records updated today - a record can only be automatically updated by this status update once per day

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( [Date Last Run] < TODAY(), NULL, [Records Updated Today] )
